item.title: Mountain 'Bushmen'
item.summary: Mountain Bushman. By /han≠kass’o (L VIII.-22. 7982 rev.-7984 rev.). Regarding Mountain Bushmen. (L VIII.-26. 8280 rev.). A note about the 'Mountain Bushmen' (!kaugen !k'e), who live in the mountain 'kloofs' (or valleys) on the side of the Tki (a river). Another group of |xam (or branch of the 'Mountain Bushmen', called the !kaugen ss'o !k'e) lives to the south of the 'Mountain Bushmen'.
item.comments: 1) This story is found in Book VIII-26
item.author: |han≠kass'o (Klein Jantje) (VIII)

keyword.subkw: 'Mountain Folk', or 'Berg Bushmen' are !kaugen !k'e and !kaugen ss'o !k'e
